timer_cancelled: Timer cancelled due to illegal skip attempt
timer_reset: You got reset due to illegal skip attempt
no_records_available_bonus: No records available for Bonus {0} on {1}
invalid_bonus_stage: Please enter a valid Bonus stage i.e: {lime}!topbonus 1
invalid_bonus_rb: Please enter a valid Bonus stage i.e: {lime}!rb <index>
stages_unavalible_respawnpos: {lightred}No RespawnStagePos with index {0} found for current map!
stages_enter_valid: Please enter a valid stage i.e: {lime}!stage <index>
reached_max_free: You reached your maximum free points rewards of {lime}{0}{default}!
top_10_points: Top 10 Players with the most points:
replaying_world_top: Replaying the World Top {0} type {lime}!stop or {lime}!stopreplay {default}to exit the replay
replaying_server_top: Replaying the Server Top {0} type {lime}!stop or {lime}!stopreplay {default}to exit the replay
replaying_pb: Replaying your PB type {lime}!stop or {lime}!stopreplay {default}to exit the replay
replay_corrupt: The requested replay seems to be corrupted
replay_dont_exist: The requested replay does not exist
no_respawnpos_bonus_index: {lightred}No RespawnBonusPos with index {0} found for current map!
map_using_manual_zones: Current Map is using manual zones
not_inside_startzone: You are not inside the Start Zone!
styles_disabled: Styles are currently disabled on this server
styles_not_supported: Styles are currently not supported on local records :(
cant_use_checkpoint: {lightred}Cant use {0} while timer is on, use {default}!timer
goto_player_not_found: {lightred}Player name not found! If the name contains spaces please try {lime}!goto 'some name'
ad_replay_pb: Type {primary}!replaypb{default} to watch a replay of your personal best run!
ad_replay_sr: Type {primary}!replay or {primary}!replaysr{default} to watch a replay of the SR on {primary}{current_map}{default}!
ad_replay_top: Type {primary}!replaytop <1-10>{default} to watch a replay of a top run on {primary}{current_map}{default}!
ad_replay_bonus: Type {primary}!replaybonus <1-10> <bonus #> (or !replayb){default} to watch a replay of a top run on a bonus stage{default}!
ad_replay_bonus_pb: Type {primary}!replaybonuspb <bonus #> (or !replaybpb){default} to watch a replay of your personal best run on a bonus stage{default}!
ad_points: Type {primary}!points{default} to see the top 10 players with the most points!
ad_respawn: Type {primary}!r{default} to respawn back to start!
ad_start_pos: Type {primary}!setresp (or !startpos){default} to save a custom respawn point within the start trigger!
ad_top: Type {primary}!top{default} to see the top 10 players on {primary}{current_map}{default}!
ad_rank: Type {primary}!rank{default} to see your current PB and Rank!
ad_save_loc: Type {primary}!saveloc{default} to save a new loc!
ad_cp: Type {primary}!cp{default} to set a new checkpoint!
ad_load_loc: Type {primary}!loadloc{default} to load the last loc!
ad_tp: Type {primary}!tp{default} to teleport to your last checkpoint!
ad_goto: Type {primary}!goto <name>{default} to teleport to a player!
ad_fov: Type {primary}!fov <0-140>{default} to change your field of view!
ad_styles: Type {primary}!styles{default} to list all available styles!
info_version: This server is running SharpTimer v{0}
afk_message: {red}You are about to be moved to AFK!
error_savingtime: Error Saving Time: Player time is 0 ticks
error_stagenotmatchfinalone: Error Saving Time: Player current stage does not match final one{0}
error_checkpointnotmatchfinalone: Error Saving Time: Player current checkpoint does not match final one{0}
Check_console: Check your console for a list of available commands!
console_rb: • !rb <#> / !b <#> (css_rb / css_b) - Respawns you to a bonus
console_setresp: • !setresp / !startpos (css_setresp / css_startpos) - Save a custom respawn point within the start trigger
console_top: • !top (css_top) - Lists top 10 records on this map
console_topbonus: • !topbonus <#> (css_topbonus) - Lists top 10 records of a bonus
console_rank: • !rank (css_rank) - Shows your current rank and pb
console_ranks: • !ranks (css_ranks) - Shows a list of the server ranks
console_loadloc: • !loadloc (css_loadloc) - Teleports you to the last Loc
console_tp: • !tp (css_tp) - Teleports you to the last Checkpoint
console_replay: • !replay / !replaysr (css_replay / css_replaysr) - Replay the current map server record
console_replaytop: • !replaytop [1-10] (css_replaytop) - Replay a top 10 server map record
console_replaypb: • !replaypb (css_replaypb) - Replay your pb for the current map
console_replaybonus: • !replaybonus / !replayb [1-10] [bonus stage] (css_replaybonus) - Replay a top 10 server bonus record
console_replaybonuspb: • !replaybonuspb / !replaybpb (css_replaybonuspb) - Replay your pb for a bonus
console_spec: • !spec (css_spec) - Moves you to Spectator or back to a team
